statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_subsidies;
SELECT id, subsidy_name FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT subsidy_name, cost FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_subsidies ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT subsidy_name, cost FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE subsidy_name LIKE 'Solar%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE availability = true ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT subsidy_name, cost FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 AND availability = true;
SELECT subsidy_name, cost FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE subsidy_name LIKE '%solar%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE cost < 2000;
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_amount FROM renewable_energy_subsidies;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE subsidy_amount > 1000;
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_start_date, subsidy_end_date FROM renewable_energy_subsidies ORDER BY subsidy_end_date ASC;
SELECT energy_type, cost_per_unit, cost_unit FROM energy_cost WHERE is_renewable = TRUE;
SELECT subsidy_id, subsidy_name, subsidy_amount, subsidy_start_date, subsidy_end_date FROM renewable_energy_subsidies ORDER BY subsidy_amount DESC;
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_amount FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE subsidy_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_subsidies WHERE subsidy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_amount, subsidy_start_date FROM renewable_energy_subsidies ORDER BY subsidy_start_date DESC
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_amount, cost_per_unit FROM renewable_energy_subsidies rs JOIN energy_cost ec ON rs.subsidy_id = ec.cost_id
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_amount, cost_per_unit, is_renewable FROM renewable_energy_subsidies rs JOIN energy_cost ec ON rs.subsidy_id = ec.cost_id WHERE ec.is_renewable = TRUE
SELECT * FROM Subsidies;
SELECT subsidy_id, subsidy_name, subsidy_amount FROM Subsidies ORDER BY subsidy_amount DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_location = 'California';
SELECT price_id, price, provider_name FROM EnergyPrices JOIN EnergyProviders ON EnergyPrices.provider_id = EnergyProviders.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyPrices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Subsidies
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_amount FROM Subsidies ORDER BY subsidy_name ASC
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_location='California'
SELECT * FROM EnergyPrices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT provider_name, price FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyPrices ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyPrices.provider_id
SELECT * FROM AvailabilitySubsidies;
SELECT subsidy_name, amount FROM CostSubsidies WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT tech_name, efficiency FROM EligibleTechnologies ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT region_name, country, population FROM Regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT subsidy_name, start_date, end_date, funding_source FROM AvailabilitySubsidies WHERE funding_source = 'Government';
SELECT subsidy_id, subsidy_name, amount FROM AvailabilitySubsidies WHERE funding_source = 'Government' ORDER BY subsidy_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT subsidy_name, start_date, end_date FROM AvailabilitySubsidies WHERE amount > 1000 AND eligible_regions LIKE '%Europe%';

SELECT subsidy_name, funding_source, start_date, end_date FROM CostSubsidies JOIN AvailabilitySubsidies ON CostSubsidies.subsidy_id = AvailabilitySubsidies.subsidy_id WHERE CostSubsidies.amount < 500 AND AvailabilitySubsidies.funding_source = 'Private';
SELECT subsidy_name, eligible_technologies, amount FROM CostSubsidies WHERE amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY subsidy_name ASC, amount DESC;

SELECT subsidy_name, amount, funding_source, region_name FROM AvailabilitySubsidies JOIN Regions ON AvailabilitySubsidies.eligible_regions = Regions.region_name WHERE Regions.country = 'United States' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM subsidies;
SELECT subsidy_name, subsidy_amount FROM subsidies;
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, facility_name, region_name FROM providers p JOIN facilities f ON p.facility_id = f.facility_id JOIN regions r ON f.region_id = r.region_id;
SELECT subsidy_name, start_date, end_date FROM subsidies WHERE subsidy_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM subsidies;
SELECT subsidy_id, subsidy_name, subsidy_amount FROM subsidies WHERE subsidy_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE region_id = 5 ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, facility_name, region_name FROM providers JOIN facilities ON providers.facility_id = facilities.facility_id JOIN regions ON regions.region_id = facilities.region_id;

SELECT application_id, provider_name, subsidy_name, application_date FROM applications JOIN providers ON applications.provider_id = providers.provider_id JOIN subsidies ON applications.subsidy_id = subsidies.subsidy_id ORDER BY application_date DESC;
